website_summaries.verdict: Natural ingredients in a cream format for those who don't like roll-on applicators.
pros: Fragrance free, wax, and silicone free is good for the most sensitive skin
Creates a micro-layer over the skin that is designed to prevent blisters and frictions
Tested and approved by extreme athletes
cons: Some customers did not like the cream formula

customer_reviews.title: There’s nothing I’d rather rub between my legs
customer_reviews.text: I can’t run over about 6 or 7 miles without getting a blister on my right foot and chafing on my inner thighs as well as in the... intercheekal area. Lately I learned that at about 15 miles the nipple chafage starts. This morning I showered, dried, and slathered ChafeX on the aforementioned parts. Then, I ran my first (who are we kidding, only one ever) full marathon. No blisters, no chafing anywhere, none, period. Now I’m going to eat a double bacon cheeseburger and fall asleep on the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Reid Bell

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Cream
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is what dreams are made of! Saved me the pain,torment,embarrassment and torture of many chub rubs. Use for all occasions from wearing a flirty dress in the summer to walking 3 or 4 miles with your furry kids. Even helps with chafing on ankles, where shoes rub or any where a bra causes irritation and chafing. Does smell like elmers glue upon application but the smell fades as it dries. *Note- Important to let it dry. Wash hands after applying with soap.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best antichafing product !
customer_reviews.text: I have been using ChafeX for several years . I used to chafe regularly to the point of bleeding at times. Since using ChafeX, this no longer happens. I used it recently during the Boston Marathon. It was pouring rain the entire 26.2 miles. At the end of the race, I didn’t chafe or get blisters on my feet. This product really works and I’ve tried many others before I found ChafeX . Give it a try, you won’t be sorry .
customer_reviews.author: Ricarda Benz

customer_reviews.title: Best anti-chafe product on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! It’s the only anti-chafe product that has worked to stop chaffing under my sports bra! I literally have scars from my first marathon training and searched for a product to help this time around! I highly recommended this! Follow the directions and it works exactly like it says! Minnesota humidity is a killer and this product helps a ton!
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Kath

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best anti chafing product on the market
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best anti chafing product on the market! My husband and I are both long distance runners doing many road races from 5k-marathon so we have tried many products. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Matt B.

customer_reviews.title: ChafeX is great. Everyone should try it.
customer_reviews.text: ChafeX is amazing. I have run many races over the last 16 years. Since finding this product my long runs and races are much more comfortable and chafe free. The one race that come to mind that ChafeX did the trick for is my last 50 miler. Rain, mud, and cold temps for just over 15 hours...not only did I finish but I finished completely blister free thanks to ChafeX.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Gryszowka

customer_reviews.title: Most Amazing Anti-Chafe Product Available
customer_reviews.text: A tad pricey, but well worth every penny; a tube goes along way. Hands-down, the best anti-chafe product on the market. Numerous endurance events, obstacle course races, and workouts under wet conditions; never any hotspots or chafing. Amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: kathy connor

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I have been running marathons for 4 years now and suffered from TERRIBLE chaffing around my bra area. No matter what I wore I'd come home torn up and left with many scars. I tried Chafex 2 years ago and it's made a huge difference. I never run marathons without it now.
customer_reviews.author: meganT

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is an ultra-runner; he first tried ChafeX after receiving a sample at a 50-mile race. He has sworn by it for years. My daughter (a high school cross-country and track athlete) and I (more of a recreational runner, but I've done a bunch of half-marathons and 2 full marathons) have very sensitive skin and are prone to chafing in lots of places. We've tried many products over the years but still chafed (those showers after long runs were brutal). ChafeX works. That's the bottom line: it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'll be ordering another tube.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my feet for when I play tennis. I've been playing for over 20 years, and it's the best product for my feet that I have ever used. I let my wife use it on her feet to break in some new shoes. She won't give it back. I'll be ordering another tube for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon

customer_reviews.title: This is the best
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It has gotten me through several ultras, numerous marathons, and many long runs. Used it for years and never had a problem. Never a blister or sore, hot spot. Easy to use and just plain GOOD.
customer_reviews.author: S. D. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Sorry. Didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could tell you it worked. I was careful to follow their directions to a “T”, and I still got blisters on both heels... the day before a seven mile hike. Very discouraging.
customer_reviews.author: AC Link

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Covers your foot with a slick shell once hardened. Does reduce friction for ultraruns, although it is not a magic cure.
customer_reviews.author: Honey Badger

customer_reviews.title: Apply once and go
customer_reviews.text: This is the bomb. It stays all day. No more chub rub thigh chafing going on. Its pricey but very much worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for such a small bottle. My husband doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Expensive for such a small bottle. My husband doesn't even use it anymore. He just pounds on the vaseline, which is much more affordable
customer_reviews.author: Amy Holladay

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Completely odorless and doesn't hurt clothing at ALL. This stuff is amazing for breaking in new shoes, athletics, and labor alike. It even seems to keep the skin cooler, which is extremely handy when working or working out.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Really helps with chaffing in the crotch area during hard exercise sessions - for males and females.
customer_reviews.text: Really helps with chaffing in the crotch area during hard exercise sessions - for males and females. This is as effective as anything else we have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: This product is not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Hated it, I have tried literally everything to fix chafing for large legs and this was one of the worst I’ve tried. You can use deodorant and it works 100x better, smells better and is so much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Delaney Rushing

customer_reviews.title: No MORE Chafing EVER
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this stuff! It has saved me in so many ways! It got me through a rainy Boston Marathon and running in HOT Texas summer with ZERO chafing! And when I forget to use it (which isn't often), I apply it after and it helps alleviate the pain on the next workouts!! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: super product
customer_reviews.text: I ran a marathon and I used it before the race --> no chafe, no blister nothing. Super product. I will use it again for my ironman.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No chafing!
customer_reviews.text: Discovered ChafeX a couple years ago, and it's exactly what I needed for longer trail races esp. in warmer weather. Works great for places where my shirt and/or pack rubs. No chafing at all!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lattanzi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for long runs!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was skeptical to purchase, due to the high cost. However, this is just the stuff you need if you want to avoid chum rub, bleeding nipples, and all that lovely chaffing you can get from running. I’m more than happy with this purchase. Not only does a little go a long way, it says what it claims to do. I recently tried this for a marathon and I had no uncomfortable chaffing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Runnergrl

customer_reviews.title: Happy running thighs!
customer_reviews.text: This has saved my thoughts countless miles of running. I use it every long training run and for actual races. LIFE SAVER
customer_reviews.author: Shannon R

customer_reviews.title: Won't run without it!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best anti-chafing product on the market! It stands up to the heat/humidity of Mississippi summers. I've run many marathons and Ultra marathon without a single spot of chafing or blisters. Won't run without it!
customer_reviews.author: melinda howard

customer_reviews.title: Removed my first review
customer_reviews.text: They removed my first review because it was negative and wasn’t glorifying the product, so just be aware that you may not be seeing all the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: The “DEFENDER” all other products “PRETENDER”
customer_reviews.text: 10 star rating if available. This product is the “defender” vs all other products “pretender”. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Dan L

customer_reviews.title: Not the miracle I am still looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my thighs. Still get blusters on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: B C Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: little one that I had was getting worse and it made me really uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have a lot of chafing problems, but the tiny, little one that I had was getting worse and it made me really uncomfortable. This took care of everything.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: As an avid runner on warm days I have struggled ...
customer_reviews.text: As an avid runner on warm days I have struggled to find a solution to avoid blisters and chaffing. This product does the trick! My Dad even uses it for his fingers and hands when he competes in rowing
customer_reviews.author: Eileen C.

customer_reviews.title: A product that actually works
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely the best! I no longer get chafing or blisters. We all know how annoying they are when all you want to do is run or hike. I would 100% recommend you try this product. Update from 4/12/18 There's a doc who did a review of this, and it's exactly how I feel!!! Attached below
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Best anti chafe product
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best product on the market. I've used a few different body glides and I prefer chafex because it's not greasy or slippery. I've used it in several races, including a marathon, and many training runs, and haven't chafed since! Also it's stays put through extreme moisture but then comes off pretty easy with soap. Looking forward to using it this summer during my ironman training.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: and I am glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product for the first time the day of a marathon - not something you are supposed to do if you haven't been training with it - and it saved my feet! The owner of the company talked me into trying it at the race expo, and I am glad I did! It's not greasy like other anti-chafing products. Put it on the night before your event and reapply in the morning. It works great to prevent blisters on your feel and hot spots in your body. So glad I tried it!
customer_reviews.author: Alison J. Bureau

customer_reviews.title: Best product for chafing!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the best product I have ever used for chafing. I was given a tube at marathon expo about a year ago and haven't used anything else since. Being a runner from the south, I was always suffering from serious hot spots, especially during the summer months. Now, I never run without it. This stuff really works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my Chafex!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stuff out there. My most frequent chafing spot is under my arms. There are a few times that I have forgotten to apply it or missed a spot and you definitely know the difference from when you wear it and when you don't. I just finished a half marathon with this stuff, and took the time to apply it everywhere just to be safe. I felt amazing after! Not one spot on my body had any chafing effects on it. I recommend this to a friend, I recommend it to my enemies. I recommend it for any runner/active person who experiences chafing because you put it on, and forget it's there.
customer_reviews.author: Sean S.

customer_reviews.title: ChafeX: Funny name, best lube out there.
customer_reviews.text: For my distance running, nothing works like ChafeX. I'm out on the trail all day. I need something that lasts, especially when temps rise. During my last event, it held up in 80° heat running a trail 100k. No reapplication was necessary. No hot spots, no blisters, no abraded skin. Follow the directions, and it won't let you down. And the folks that own ChafeX really care about athletes. They want a connection with their customers. That's enough to make me a life long customer. I recommend it to all my ultrarunning friends. Thanks!!!!
customer_reviews.author: vttrailgirl

customer_reviews.title: This really works and is long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: This product is truly saving my skin. In my years of long distance running, I have struggled with chafing issues for years. I have tried many products and nothing has worked as well as ChafeX. With other products, it was hit or miss if it would last long enough for me to avoid painful marks on my body. Every time I have used ChafeX, I have no problems. This really is the anti-chafing product for me.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I used this last year and I'm using it again this year. I think the key is to use way more than you think you should, which I think some people might hesitate to do because the tube is so small. But when I used a real good amount, and I sit with my legs apart to let it dry, it does protect my inner thighs from chafing.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Chafex is a spectacular product. If your feet get wet in a marathon or ultra, even up to 24 hours, chafex will likely get you to the finish with feet in great shape. Other stuff happens in long races but chafex really eliminates foot issues,. I've run over 400 Ultras AND marathons no double counting and this stuff will absolutely save your feet from DNF issues. My last DNF in a rain drenched 100k would have been a comfortable finish except I got trenchfoot and stupidly didn't apply Chafex before. UNBELIEVABLE product, I have no financial interest in chafex. It is spectacular for eliminating wet feet problems in long runs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ChafeX works for runners
customer_reviews.text: ChafeX works great. I run four or five marathons a year and I haven't had a blister on my feet since I started using the product two years ago. I also use it my thighs. My running partner uses it to prevent chafing around her jog bra. I find it's easier to apply than stick products, particularly around my toes. One tube lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: bigdad

customer_reviews.title: The best anti-chafe on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Chafex online and would definitely give this product a 5 star rating. I've tried just about every anti-chafe/blister product available. This is the only one that works every time, regardless of the conditions. I've run in rain, heat, humidity, snow, through deep water crossings and ChafeX has never let me down. It is important to follow the how to instructions as you do need to apply ChafeX and wait before getting dressed or putting your socks and shoes on. If applied properly, chafing and blisters will be a non-issue. Thanks for creating a product that really works!
customer_reviews.author: RunnerMom

customer_reviews.title: ChafeX: it is over stated
customer_reviews.text: I had my 19 miles long run in today's morning, i put chafeX on my both legs, it was chafing my legs, it is really hurts!!! i will return it, do not waste your money on this ChafeX! it is BS!!
customer_reviews.author: LA Runner

customer_reviews.title: ... over a year and a half and it is excellent!! I apply it everywhere that fabric could ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using ChafeX for over a year and a half and it is excellent!! I apply it everywhere that fabric could rub against my skin (ladies those jog bra burns are a thing of the past). I apply it to heels, in between toes, under my sports bra, thighs. You name it!! I ran the NYC Marathon in 2015 (It was my first full marathon) and I came out chafe free. ChafeX has become an essential on my run gear list!!
customer_reviews.author: VL

customer_reviews.title: Great Anti-Chaffing Product
customer_reviews.text: I tried a few different products but ChafeX was by far the best. Great for runners or any kind of athlete. Also, they have great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: rwk623

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't recommend something more strongly
customer_reviews.text: Serendipitously discovered ChafeX before my 21 mile training run and literally saved me from disaster. Lived up to all its hype and promotion. Will definitely be using it during the Boston Marathon and look forward to all my runs being chafe and blister free. Couldn't recommend something more strongly.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel E. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Best Anti-Chafing cream I have used!! Non greasy unlike the others. Comes off easy but stays put until you take it off. Not only do I use it for running but I also use it while working my part time job to prevent chafing on my neck from the tuxedo top. A must have in every gym bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best product for athletes prone to chafing.
customer_reviews.text: Best anti-chafing product I have found so far! I have tried a lot of different products and this works no matter how far you run or how hot or wet you get. I recommend this to all my running or mutli-sports friends.
customer_reviews.author: Henning Smith

customer_reviews.title: ChafeX is the Best
customer_reviews.text: ChafeX is the best. Much better than lube. I recently did a 22 mile training run for Boston and was chafe-free. No more painful showers after the hard efforts. Can't recommend enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the real deal. Went 18 miles today with high humidity and absolutely no issues in my hot spots. Great on toes!
customer_reviews.author: Carmine Firenza

customer_reviews.title: Effective, reliable, long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: Effective, reliable product from a Boston-based company with strong customer service focus. I've been using ChafeX for about 3 years for everything from half-marathons to 50-milers, and I've found it works well in a variety of environments/temperatures, moisture levels, and distances. I use it on nipples, groin area, sides/balls of the feet, and between the toes, and it keeps away blistering / chafing during the whole race day without having to re-apply. It's also not slimy or smelly and won't leave a residue on clothing, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Dibb

customer_reviews.title: This is the most amazing sports lube ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing sports lube ever. It is so different from other lubes where this actually forms a barrier on your skin that you cannot see or feel. It has gotten me through dozens of marathons and ultra marathons including 100 mile races with my skin in good condition. Thanks ChafeX for this amazing product. I'll be a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: TheBestDogMom

customer_reviews.title: Saved my butt (literally) :)
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much the best thing out there. I would NOT have gotten through many of my races without it! I was in a dire situation in a 200+ mile race in Europe when another competitor handed me a tube - it literally saved my butt. I make sure now to have ChafeX with me for all of my endurance events. No other product I've used comes close to its durability.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

product_meta.title: ChafeX Anti Chafe Anti Blister Skin Cream. The end of chafing and blistering. Not a lube-New Science. 100% made in USA including formula, tube and cap
feature_bullets: Unlike lubricant products which simply sit on top of the skin, ChafeX is unique. It safely bonds to your skin to prevent chafing and blistering. Only product that can do that. Finally, the end to chafing and blistering
ChafeX works in rain, heat, humidity and won't wash, sweat or rub off. Don't let chafing or blisters stop you; no more painful showers
73% of serious athletes said: "Best Product I ever used". We're talking Ultras, Tri's and Marathoners. If it works for them, it will work for you, and one tube can easily last 6-9 months
Works to avoid skin irritations from clothes, shoes, water, sand, thigh rubbing and especially facial masks (Maskne)
Doctor Recommended, Fragrance and Gluten free, not tested on animals and won't stain clothes. This breakthrough science finally puts an end to chafing and blistering.
